author: pipermerriam
content:
Reminder for those of you in the first cohort (cohort-zero): We are quickly approaching the end of the program.

- How to get feedback on your participation in the program: https://github.com/ethereum-cdap/cohort-zero/issues/152
- How to showcase your work if you are interested in this leading to a job: https://github.com/ethereum-cdap/cohort-zero/tree/main/showcase
